alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF HAMPTON, COLLETON, ALLENDALE AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 422 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rivers Bridge State Park to Lake Warren State Park to Garnett, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Hampton, Yemassee, Lake Warren State Park, Colleton, Varnville, Estill, Brunson, and Gifford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify. Be certain to monitor local radio and TV stations as well as local cable TV outlets for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper
